name: Celestial Companion
target: animal companion, eidolon, familiar, or mount
text: You bestow divine protection on your companion. The target gains spell resistance equal to 5 plus half your caster level against spells and spell-like effects produced by evil creatures. The target also gains a +1 sacred bonus on saving throws and DR 5/evil or silver. Creatures under the effects of this spell often take on a celestial appearance, such as golden feathers or a radiant aura, but they are not truly celestial creatures.
target_zh: 接触的魔宠，动物伙伴，坐骑或魂兽
savingThrow_zh: 意志, 通过则无效 (无害)
text_zh: 你赋予你的同伴神圣的保护。 目标对邪恶生物施展的法术和类法术获得等于 5 加你施法者等级一半的法术抗力。同时获得DR 5/邪恶或银，在对抗上述效果的豁免上也获得 +1 神圣加值。 受此法术影响的生物通常具有天界外观，例如金色羽毛或光环，但它们并不是真正的天界生物。
